original_title: Live 8 Africa Calling Concert - The Eden Project
overview: On 2 July 2005 a Live 8 concert was held at the Eden Project, Cornwall, United Kingdom. The event was dubbed "Africa Calling", but was also known as "LIVE 8: Africa Calling" or "Africa Calling: LIVE 8 at the Eden Project"
title: Live 8 Africa Calling Concert - The Eden Project
